title: Nicole Dotin
content:
[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921022239/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921022239/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Nicole Dotin

[Process Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921022239/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Process%20Type%20Foundry), with [Eric Olson](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921022239/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eric%20Olson).

Nicole designed the typeface _Elena_ at the [University of Reading](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921022239/http:/typophile.com/wiki/University%20of%20Reading), 2007.

[http://www.processtypefoundry.com/about/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921022239/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/about/index.html "http://www.processtypefoundry.com/about/index.html")  
 [http://www.processtypefoundry.com/images/front/Elena\_Preview.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921022239/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/images/front/Elena_Preview.pdf "http://www.processtypefoundry.com/images/front/Elena\_Preview.pdf")
author: dan_reynolds
